bill_title: make an appropriation to the building South Dakota fund and to provide for the disbursement thereof.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation to the building South Dakota fund and to provide for the disbursement thereof. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the employer's investment in South Dakota's future fund the sum of five million dollars ($5,000,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the building South Dakota fund. Notwithstanding § 1-16G-47.1, no funds appropriated by this Act may be used for the administrative expenses of the building South Dakota fund programs. Section 2. The commissioner of the Bureau of Finance and Management shall authorize and disburse the appropriation in section 1 as follows: (1) Twenty-five percent shall be transferred to the local infrastructure improvement grant fund created in § 1-16G-50; (2) Five percent shall be transferred to the economic development partnership fund created in § 1-16G-51; (3) Thirty percent shall be transferred to the workforce education fund created in § 13-13-88; (4) Thirty-five percent shall be transferred to the South Dakota housing opportunity fund created in § 11-13-2; and (5) Five percent shall be transferred to the revolving economic development and initiative fund created in § 1-16G-3 for the purpose of making grants to projects that have a total project cost of less than twenty million dollars.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
